1.name: Serpent’s Touch
1.desc: Stealing inflicts poison. Your attacks while in the downed state apply poison.

2.name: Lotus Poison
2.desc: Weaken targets when you poison them.

3.name: Exposed Weakness
3.desc: Deal 10% more damage if your target has a condition.

1.name: Dagger Training
1.desc: Dagger damage is increased by 5% to poisoned foes.

2.name: Mug
2.desc: Deal damage and gain life when stealing. This attack cannot critically hit enemies.

3.name: Trappers Respite
3.desc: Drop a needle trap when you use a healing skill.

1.name: Resourceful Trapper
1.desc: Stealing reduces cooldown of currently recharging traps by 10s.

2.name: Panic Strike
2.desc: Striking a foe that is below the health threshold (50%) immobilize them.

3.name: Revealed Training
3.desc: Gain 200 extra power while you are revealed.

1.name: Potent Poison
1.desc: Increased poison duration by 33%. Poison deals 50% increased damage.

2.name: Improvisation
2.desc: You can use stolen items twice. One random skill category is immediately recharged when you steal.

3.name: Executioner
3.desc: Deal 20% extra damage when your target is below the health threshold (50%).

1.name: Keen Observer
1.desc: Critical-hit chance is increased by 5% 3while your health is above the threshold (90%).

2.name: Unrelenting Strikes
2.desc: Critical hit damage is increased against foes whose health is below the threshold (33%).

3.name: First Strikes
3.desc: Critical damage is increased by 10% while your current initiative is over the threshold (6).

1.name: Side Strike
1.desc: Gain 7% bonus critical-hit chance when hitting a foe from behind or the side.

2.name: Signet of Power
2.desc: Gain might when activating a signet. Signet recharge is reduced.

3.name: Combo Critical Chance
3.desc: Duel wield skills have 5% increased critical-hit chance.

1.name: Sundering Strikes
1.desc: Critical hits have a 50% chance to cause vulnerability.

2.name: Practiced Tolerance
2.desc: Gain 10% vitality based on your precision.

3.name: Ankle Shots
3.desc: Critical hits with pistols have a 60% chance to cripple foes. Pistol strikes deal 10% increased damage to crippled foes.

1.name: Ricochet
1.desc: Pistol shots have 50% chance to bounce to an additional target. Pistol range is increased by 150.

2.name: Hidden Killer
2.desc: Gain 100% bonus critical-hit chance while in stealth.

3.name: Invigorating Precision
3.desc: You are healed for 15% of outgoing critical hit damage.

1.name: Last Refuge
1.desc: Use Blinding Powder when your health reaches a certain threshold (25%)

2.name: Meld with Shadows
2.desc: Stealth skills last longer (1s)

3.name: Resilience of Shadows
3.desc: Stealth effects that you apply reduce incoming attack damage by 50%

1.name: Merciful Ambush
1.desc: Stealth yourself and your target when reviving an ally. You revive allies 10% faster.

2.name: Concealed Defeat
2.desc: Create a Smoke Screen when downed. Deception abilities recharge 20% faster.

3.name: Shadow’s Embrace
3.desc: Remove 1 conditions periodically (3s) while in stealth.

1.name: Shadow Protector
1.desc: When you grant stealth to an ally, they gain regeneration. This effect does not trigger if your ally already has regeneration.

2.name: Descent of Shadows
2.desc: Release a blinding powder when you steal or take falling damage. You take 50% less damage from falling.

3.name: Leeching Venoms
3.desc: Gain might when activating a venom. Siphon life from your foe when triggering a venom. This can only occur once per strike.

1.name: Cloaked in Shadow
1.desc: Gain stealth blinds nearby foes.

2.name: Shadow’s Rejuvenation
2.desc: Regenerate health and initiative while in stealth.

3.name: Venomous Aura
3.desc: When you use a venom skill, you apply the effects to all nearby allies as well. Venom recharges are reduced by 20%.

1.name: Expeditious Dodger
1.desc: Gain swiftness upon dodging.

2.name: Feline Grace
2.desc: Gain vigor upon successfully evading an attack.

3.name: Endless Stamina
3.desc: The effects of vigor on you are enhanced by 20%.

1.name: Fleet Shadow
1.desc: Move 50% faster while in stealth.

2.name: Vigorous Recovery
2.desc: Gain vigor when using a healing skill.

3.name: Pain Response
3.desc: Gain regeneration and remove damaging conditions when struck while below the health threshold (75%).

1.name: Guarded Initiation
1.desc: Gain resistance when striking an enemy while your health is full.

2.name: Swindler’s Equilibrium
2.desc: Successfully evading an attack while wielding a sword recharges steal by a static amount.

3.name: Hard to Catch
3.desc: Break stun and refill endurance when you are disabled.

1.name: Assassin’s Reward
1.desc: Heal yourself whenever you use a skill that uses initiative. Heal yourself for each point of initiative spent.

2.name: Quick Pockets
2.desc: Gain initiative on swapping weapons while in combat.

3.name: Don’t Stop
3.desc: Periodically evade projectile attacks while under effects of swiftness

1.name: Kleptomaniac
1.desc: Stealing give you initiative.

2.name: Preparedness
2.desc: Increase maximum initiative by 3

3.name: Lead Attacks
3.desc: Increases 1% damage per initiative. Steal recharges 15% faster.

1.name: Uncatchable
1.desc: Leave behind Caltrops when you dodge.

2.name: Flanking Strikes
2.desc: Gain haste when attacking a foe from behind or the side.

3.name: Thrill of the Crime
3.desc: When you Steal, you and all nearby allies gain fury, might, and swiftness for 10 seconds.

1.name: Bountiful Theft
1.desc: Stealing grants you and all nearby allies vigor. You rip boons from your target and grant them to nearby allies.

2.name: Trickster
2.desc: Reduces recharge on tricks by 20%. Tricks remove conditions.

3.name: Pressure Striking
3.desc: Enemies you interrupt are inflicted with torment.

1.name: Hastened Replenishment
1.desc: You receive initiative when using a heal skill.

2.name: Sleight of Hand
2.desc: Stealing also dazes the target. Reduces the recharge of Steal.

3.name: Bewildering Ambush
3.desc: Stealing also applies confusion.
